Class ControlGroupView

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class ControlGroupView
extends AControlGroupView
    Player View. below simple use for layout. 
     Attrs
 ==========================================
 app:show_timeout="5000"(5s)
 app:rewind_increment="5000"(5s)
 app:fast_forward_increment="15000"(15s)
 app:use_gesture_detector="false"
 app:default_control_layer_id="..."
 app:...
    See Also:
    PlayerView, ControlLayerView

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • show

        public boolean show()
        Shows the playback controls. If AControlGroupView.getShowTimeoutMs() is positive then the controls will be automatically hidden after this duration of time has elapsed without user input.
        Overrides:
        show in class AControlGroupView
        Returns:
        Whether need to deal with [!isVisibleByInteractionArea()]
